Name: Donna's Creamy'Tini
Ingredients: 25 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A fine example of an alcoholic liquid pudding.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2002 by Yannick Miseriaux at the Fifth Floor Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Donna's Creamy'Tini contains 315 calories
